name: Battlechest Arena (Canceled)
blurb: Manifest the first-of-its-kind virtual combat sport on mobile devices.\nBecome the greatest among modern gladiators.

rewards.reward: "Advantaged Neophyte" - Your great potential and discipline are recognized. You begin with 2 chests and 12 original weapons of battle.\r\nBONUS: All rewards include access to development blogs.

"Fortunate Neophyte" - Fortune shines on you. Gain an additional chest with 6 more weapons, plus re-forge and enhance six weapons of your choosing.\r\nBONUS: Receive a commemorative postcard with augmented digital content. ("Fortunate Neophyte" rewards included with all higher level rewards)

"Influential Subject" - Establish your title with the honor of Enduring Advocate. Receive access to the beta test (included with all higher level rewards).\r\nBONUS: Receive a set of 9 original collectable cards with augmented digital content.

"Prosperous Subject" - Heirlooms enhance the power of your chest. Encrust six of your weapons with mystical jewels.\r\nBONUS: Receive a set of 18 original collectable cards with augmented digital content.

"Opulent Subject" - Acquaintance with mysterious dealings empowers you. Engrave six of your weapons with runes of power (in addition to above enhancements).\r\nBONUS: Receive a set of 27 original collectable cards with augmented digital content.

"Wealthy Subject" -  Tutelage under a warrior of legend gains you their invaluable wisdom in the ways of combat. Unlock the ability to use all of your enhanced weapons (in addition to above enhancements).\r\nBONUS: Receive the complete set of 36 original collectable cards with augmented digital content.

"Privileged Subject" - Your grandsire was renown for his battle prowess. The great weapon you carry now carries your surname (in addition to above enhancements).\r\nBONUS: Receive complete set of 36 original collectable cards and signed copy of the limited Battlechest promotional poster with augmented digital content. ("Privileged Subject" rewards included with all higher level rewards)

"Silver Patron" - Find yourself forever listed on the roles as a founding member of the new realm along with a recognition in your title. BONUS: Receive a limited edition print from the 'Unearthed' collection featured in the video with augmented digital content.
"Born on a Good Day" - A Silver Patron of good fortune. An arena has been erected in the honor of your name.

"Artisan" - A Silver Patron and a keen craftsman. Design an original weapon for Battlechest that will carry the name of your choosing.\r\nBONUS: Receive an original piece of hand drawn and signed concept art.

"Brilliant Savant" - A Silver Patron gifted in mysterious arts. Design an original magic enhancement for Battlechest that will carry the name of your choosing.\r\nBONUS: Receive an original piece of hand drawn and signed concept art.

"Lore Master" - A Silver Patron of many great journeys. Design an original rune for Battlechest that will carry the name of your choosing.\r\nBONUS: Receive an original piece of hand drawn and signed concept art.
"Gold Patron" - Find yourself forever listed on the roles as a gold founding member of the new realm along with a recognition in your title.
